system.description:
At 14th level you’ve learned how to ingratiate yourself into a community or tie yourself to the magic of the land. As a series of rituals requiring 24 hours of uninterrupted work, you can take root in a specific community such as a village, city, or commune, or a place of magical importance such as a temple, revered grove, or convergence of leylines. You may cast the spell @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.r4yz1k7dlp8lazx5]{Transport via Plants} to travel to the place you’ve taken root without expending a spell slot. In addition, while within a mile of the place you’ve taken root, you may cast the spell @UUID[Compendium.a5e.a5e-spells.Item.8j1p6dsp3qfvjprc]{Tree Stride} without expending a spell slot.

These effects end when you attempt to take root in a new location.
